mapper.select: select rownum rnum, keep_seq, member_id, order_num, keep_cate, keep_kind, keep_count, keep_box, keep_start, keep_end, keep_now from (select rownum rnum, b.keep_seq, b.order_num, a.member_id, c.keep_cate, c.keep_kind, c.keep_count, c.keep_box, TO_CHAR(c.keep_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as keep_start, TO_CHAR(c.keep_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as keep_end, c.keep_now from memberorder a join orderlist b on a.order_num = b.order_num right join keep c on b.keep_seq = c.keep_seq where b.keep_seq > 0 order by c.keep_seq desc)
mapper.update: update keep set keep_cate = #{keep_cate}, keep_kind = #{keep_kind}, keep_count = #{keep_count}, keep_box = #{keep_box}, keep_start = #{keep_start}, keep_end = #{keep_end}, keep_now = #{keep_now} where keep_seq=#{keep_seq}
mapper.select: select keep_path from keep_photo where order_num = #{order_num}

select rownum rnum, keep_seq, member_id, order_num, keep_cate, keep_kind, keep_count, keep_box, keep_start, keep_end, keep_now from (select rownum rnum, b.keep_seq, b.order_num, a.member_id, c.keep_cate, c.keep_kind, c.keep_count, c.keep_box, TO_CHAR(c.keep_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as keep_start, TO_CHAR(c.keep_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as keep_end, c.keep_now from memberorder a join orderlist b on a.order_num = b.order_num right join keep c on b.keep_seq = c.keep_seq where b.keep_seq > 0
and (a.member_id like '%'||#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%')
order by c.keep_seq desc)
